document_data.caption: Jamaliyah enjoying a brief respite.
document_data.name: Jamaliyah
document_data.mainbody: '''Jamaliyah''' was a [[djinni]] bound to a ''[[lamp of the genies]]'' in [[Zakhara]] around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1992|747|Jamaliyah}}
document_data.Personality: Jamaliyah was exceptionally wily and intelligent with an adventurous side.
document_data.Relationships: She was owned by various merchants, healers and viziers over the years. In 1367 DR, she was owned by a courtier in [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights.
